spec_data.Name: python3-cma
spec_data.Description:
A stochastic numerical optimization algorithm for difficult
(non-convex, ill-conditioned, multi-modal, rugged, noisy) optimization
problems in continuous search spaces, implemented in Python.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:16:16 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolution Strategy numerical optimizer
